basics.name: Luis Manuel Brito
basics.label: Technical Support Specialist with 7+ years of comprehensive experience in the IT area
basics.summary: +7 years of experience as Technical Support. I currently work as an IT Specialist. I live in Caracas, Venezuela. I have worked in different environments: from technological environments for Retail Companies to restaurants. I have participated in IT infrastructure projects, technical support, server administration and specific developments to solve specific problems using programming languages such as Javascript or Python. I love learning and sharing knowledge. I consider myself a proactive, responsible person with the ability to work in a team.

work.name: MoDo Caracas
work.summary: Support users in person and remotely. Installation and configuration of Linux and Windows Servers. Preventive and corrective maintenance of Linux and Windows servers. Creation and maintenance of database and virtual/physical server backups.

work.name: Mundo Total
work.summary: Support users in person and remotely. Installation and configuration of point of sale systems and fiscal printers. Preventive and corrective maintenance of computer equipment. Creation and maintenance of database backups.

work.name: MoDo Caracas
work.summary: General Administration of Active Directory and Microsoft 365: create, edit and maintain user accounts, mailboxes, email contacts, distribution groups, organizational units and access. Provide desktop technical support and troubleshoot issues related to computers, laptops, printers, LAN, file server, remote VPN access and software applications including Xetux, Microsoft Word, Excel, Visio and Outlook. Monitor and maintain the local area network, file server, security surveillance system, office and network equipment, telecommunications lines and agency automated systems. Lead the implementation and adaptation to infrastructure of the NAGIOS monitoring system and GLPI requirements management service.

work.name: World Tel-Fax Electronics
work.summary: Execute activities related to: Provide technical support to users by installing, operating and maintaining computer equipment and programs as well as communication equipment, communication components and structured cabling. Monitoring of machine room, air conditioning structure and electrical operation. Monitoring of 900 and SMS services, web pages, servers, asterisk-avaya telephone exchange and database. Provide technical support to associates by solving problems on the technological platform and escalate to system engineers if unable to resolve reported incidents. Provide technical support to the Contact Center area and administrative area by resolving incidents using best practices.

certificates.name: Diploma in Web Programming and Databases
